title: Balinese-Inspired Apartment Stay on New South Wales' North Coast
description:
Recharge by the ocean with an apartment stay at the stylish Oaks Santai Resort Casuarina, bringing a touch of Balinese glamour to the serene North Coast of New South Wales. From its idyllic setting just 200m from the glistening turquoise waters of Casuarina Beach to its fantastic Kingscliff location, cradled by the iconic Gold Coast and laidback bohemia of Byron Bay, this tropical resort will instantly transport you to an exotic faraway land.

Chill out by the palm-fringed pool and let relaxation wash over you with a welcome bottle of wine on arrival, daily breakfast, complimentary Wi-Fi and a leisurely 12pm checkout.

title: Boutique Blueys Beach Escape on New South Wales' North Coast
description:
A coastal village renowned for its spectacular sea views, laidback café lifestyle and breathtaking surroundings, Blueys Beach on the North Coast of New South Wales is a natural paradise. Pretty spots such as Smiths Lake, Booti Booti National Park, the Green Cathedral and - of course - the iconic Blueys Beach itself await just 90 minutes' drive from Newcastle.

Blueys Retreat makes beachside living a breeze, a stone’s throw from Blueys, Elizabeth and Boomerang beaches. Stay in a one-bedroom villa for two with complimentary tennis court, racquet and ball hire included.

**Travelling with friends or family?** Upgrade to a Two-Bedroom Townhouse for four or a Three-Bedroom Townhouse for six.
offer_address: Blueys Retreat 285 Boomerang Drive, Pacific Palms NSW 2428
